_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The consequences of lacking or having co: Those lacking confidence in the religious founder were reborn in a place of loss, a bad place, the underworld, hell.
Those full of confidence in the religious founder were reborn in a good place, a heavenly realm.
The training to have no malicious intent: Train to have no malicious intent for spiritual companions.
